mapper.select: SELECT CONTENT_ID as contentID, FIRST_IMAGE as imageURL, TITLE, ADDR1, ADDR2, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, IFNULL(CNT_TB.CI, 0) as likeCount FROM ATTRACTION_INFO AS A LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(CONTENT_ID) AS CNT, CONTENT_ID AS CI FROM USER_ATTRACTION_LIKE GROUP BY CONTENT_ID) AS CNT_TB ON A.CONTENT_ID = CNT_TB.CI WHERE A.CONTENT_ID = #{contentId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM USER_ATTRACTION_LIKE WHERE CONTENT_ID = ##{contentId} AND USER_ID LIKE #{userId}
